uses_and_benefits: Provides relief from pain and inflammation
dosage: The usual dose is one or two tablets, up to three times a day.  This should only be taken as directed by a doctor or pharmacist.

time_to_improve.pain_and_fever: The onset of pain and fever relief varies, usually within a few hours of taking the medication, but the full effect might take several days.
time_to_improve.swelling: Reduction in swelling typically takes longer, often several days to a week.

precautions: Do not take more than the recommended dose.
Do not take if you have a history of stomach ulcers or bleeding.
Do not take if you have liver or kidney problems.
Consult your doctor before taking this medicine if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.
